title: Exemplary Female Education Retention
description: In 2020, Portugal achieved a 100% persistence rate for females reaching the last grade of primary education, showcasing its commitment to gender equality in education.

title: Top-tier Quality of Labor Regulations
description: Portugal scored 88.23 in 2024 for the quality of its labor regulations, placing it among the highest globally, reflecting a robust framework for workforce management.

title: Outstanding International Trade Regulations
description: In 2024, Portugal achieved a score of 88.92 for the quality of its international trade regulations, indicating a strong regulatory environment conducive to global trade.
